Reviews.Title: SE S302
Reviews.Author: Glen
Reviews.Content: This phone is very slim and has most of the basic features for the users who want a phone just below par with a smart phone.It's ability to send multimedia and listen to music (MP3), radio stations is great!. The colour is attractive to both male and female. The flash comes in handy when you're looking for small items in your car or at home especially at nights.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson S302 Crystal Blue (unlocked) International Version with No U.S Warranty
